MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClassName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要从查询中选择的类名。

span.span: Gets or sets the class name to be selected from in the query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含查询中的类的名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the class in the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的类名称。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name. 值**ClassName**属性将替换\<类名 > SELECT 查询中的窗体的项"选择 \* FROM\<类名 > 其中\<条件 >"。A value for the **ClassName** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 属性值Property Value 表示的查询中的类名称的字符串。A string representing the name of the class in the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化通过指定查询，然后更改属性。The following example initializes a by specifying a query and then changes the property. [!code-csharp[wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName/cs/SelectQuery_ClassName.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName/vb/SelectQuery_ClassName.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 SELECT 查询中应用的条件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied in the SELECT query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含要应用于 SELECT 查询的条件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition to be applied to the SELECT query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的条件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. 值**条件**属性将替换\<条件 > SELECT 查询中的窗体的项"选择 \* FROM\<类名 > 其中\<条件 >"。A value for the **Condition** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 属性值Property Value 包含要应用选定的查询中的条件的字符串。A string containing the condition to be applied in the SELECT query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSchemaQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此查询是架构查询还是实例查询。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instances query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示查询是否为架构查询。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果此查询应求得架构;`false`如果查询应求得实例。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override string QueryString { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property QueryString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 以字符串形式获取或设置 对象中的查询。

span.span: Gets or sets the query in the object, in string form.

value.span: 返回一个包含查询的 值。

span.span: Returns a value containing the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 此外，设置此属性将导致其他对象的成员时重新分析该字符串进行更新。In addition, setting this property causes the other members of the object to be updated when the string is reparsed. ## 属性值Property Value 表示查询的字符串。A string representing the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化具有默认构造函数，然后更改属性。The following example initializes a with the default constructor and then changes the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的属性。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new properties. 值**SelectedProperties**属性将替换\<属性 > SELECT 查询中的窗体的项"选择\<属性 > FROM\<类名 > 其中\<条件 >"。A value for the **SelectedProperties** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \ FROM \ WHERE \". ## 属性值Property Value A包含要在查询中选择的属性的名称。A containing the names of the properties to be selected in the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
